no-quest-available-desc: I currently don't need your help with anything.
no-quest-active-desc: I don't remember having any open contracts with you.
quest-gather20MeatFor4FlaxSeeds-title: There is no protein in flax fibre
quest-gather20MeatFor4FlaxSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor4ParsnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in parsnips
quest-gather20MeatFor4ParsnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor4TurnipSeeds-title: There is no protein in turnips
quest-gather20MeatFor4TurnipSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor4CarrotSeeds-title: There is no protein in carrots
quest-gather20MeatFor4CarrotSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor4OnionSeeds-title: There is no protein in onions
quest-gather20MeatFor4OnionSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather20MeatFor4SpeltSeeds-title: There is no protein in grain
quest-gather20MeatFor4SpeltSeeds-desc: My diet could use a little bit more variation. If you provide 20 meat of any kind, I could offer you some seeds in return.
quest-gather20CharcoalFor3Gears-desc: I want to produce some new iron tools but forgot to prepare the charcoal. Can you help me gather some coal for me? I could pay you.
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-title: Creating a weapon of great power
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-desc: If you hand me the materials as well as some payment for my work, I could create a weapon of exceptional quality for you.
quest-buy1BlackGuardSword-obj:
Gathered iron ingots: {0}/1
Gathered charcoal: {1}/1
Gathered rusty gears: {2}/5
quest-kill6WolvesFor2Gears-desc: The wolves are loosing their respect for fire. They are getting closer and closer to the cattle I am herding. I can compensate you if you fend them off.
quest-kill6FoxesFor1Gear-desc: Recently a fox broke into my chicken coop and decimated my lifestock. I do not want this to happen again. If anyone is able to hunt down six of these foxes I would be willing to pay a gear for it.
quest-kill30DriftersFor3Gears-desc: The woods simply aren't safe anymore. Drifters are everywhere. If you could clear the surrounding area from drifters, we could pay you a fair price.
quest-kill8NightmareDriftersFor5Gears-ti: The growling from the unspeakable depths
quest-kill8NightmareDriftersFor5Gears-de: We can no longer extract minerals from the mountains because of the creatures that lurk in the caves deep down below. We would be willing to pay a generous price for anyone helping to clear the depths from nightmare drifters.
quest-recruit1farmer-desc: If you can provide shelter and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit one more farmer to the village.
quest-recruit1shepherd-title: More shepherds caring for the cattle
quest-recruit1shepherd-desc: If you can provide shelter and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit one more shepherd to the village.
quest-recruit1soldier-desc: If you can provide shelter and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit one more soldier to the village.
quest-recruit1smith-title: More smiths creating tools and weapons
quest-recruit1smith-desc: If you can provide shelter and a little bit of payment, I am able to recruit a smith to the village.
quest-recruit1smith-obj:
Rusty gears: {0}/6
Free beds: {1}/1
Placed anvils: {2}/1
quest-fundvillage-start-desc: Greetings, traveler. I have been searching the lands in hopes of finding someone capable of laying the foundation of a safe haven for anyone roaming the lands. If you proof that you can handle yourself in the wilds, I can gather a small group of nomads to follow your lead.
quest-fundvillage-start-obj:
Gathered grain: {0}/32
Gathered vegetables: {1}/16
Gathered meat: {2}/8
Killed drifters: {3}/30
Free beds: {4}/3
quest-fundvillage-1-desc: You did not think this would be cheap, did you? Founding a village can be quite costly
quest-fundvillage-2-desc: The amount of food you gathered so far is mediocre at best. To actually make people stay with you, they must not be worried about starvation.
quest-fundvillage-2-obj:
Gathered grain: {0}/128
Gathered vegetables: {1}/64
Gathered meat: {2}/32
Free beds: {3}/2
quest-fundvillage-3-desc: Being able to eat is one thing. Being able to create the tools, weapons and armor to achieve a decent life in this world is another.
quest-fundvillage-3-obj:
Gathered bronze ingots: {0}/32
Gathered charcoal: {1}/64
Gathered leather: {2}/32
Free beds: {3}/1
Placed anvils: {4}/1
quest-fundvillage-final-desc: More and more people gain hope that this outpost could actually be made to last. To really gain their trust, proof that even the strongest beings from the rustworld do not stand a chance against you.
quest-fundvillage-final-obj:
Double headed drifters killed: {0}/1
Nightmare drifters killed: {1}/10
Sawblade locusts killed: {2}/5
